CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Leader_of_International_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Leader_of_International_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Leader_of_SubNational_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Leader_of_International_Coalition__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Leader_of_National_Coalition__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Leader_of_SubNational_Coalition__c , "Yes")
), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if the Grantee is a leader of a coalition or a network (at any level).
CustomField.label: Leader of Network or Coaliation
